bibl.title: Hellenistic Egypt. Monarchy, Society, Economy, Culture. Edited with an Introduction by Roger S. BAGNALL.
bibl.note: Reproduction (en version anglaise, légèrement remaniée) de 19 articles (1973-1999). - Pp. xix-xx: J.B., Foreword; - 1-12: R.S.B., Introduction. Jean Bingen and the Currents of Ptolemaic History; - 279-289: J.B., Conclusion; - 290-298: Bibliography; - 299-302: General Index; - 303: Index of Passages Cited.
BINGEN Jean, Hellenistic Egypt. Monarchy, Society, Economy, Culture. Edited with an Introduction by Roger S. BAGNALL.
Edinburgh, Edinburgh University Press, 2007, 8°, xx-303 pp., 19 figg., 3 cartes. ISBN 0-7486-1578-0 (hbk) / 0-7486-1579-7 (pbk). £60 (hbk) / £19.99 (pbk).
